description:
This #InternationalDanceDay, Spot is meeting another strange dog and making friends through the power of dance. Meet Sparkles! 

Sparkles is a custom costume designed just for Spot to explore the intersections of robotics, art, and entertainment. Learn how we build Spot's steps using Spot's Choreographer software: https://bostondynamics.com/blog/in-step-with-spot/
title: Meet Sparkles | Boston Dynamics
